definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: girl, damsel;—abs. ´[[נ]] Ju Jdg 19:3 + 22 t., also Qr Ge 24:14 + 20 t. Gn Dt ([[נַעֲרָה]] Kt in Pent. only De 22:19, v. infr.); pl. abs. [[נְעָרוֹת]] 1Sa 9:11 +, cstr. [[נַעֲרוֹת]] Es 4:4; sf. [[נַעֲרוֹתָיו]] Ru 2:22, Ru 3:2, [[נַעֲרׂתֶיהָ]] Ge 24:61, Ex 2:5, etc.;—

girl, damsel; [[קְטַנׇּה]] ´[[נ]] little girl only 2Ki 5:2, cf. v:2Ki 5:4, perh. = young daughters Job 40:29; elsewh. = young woman 1Sa 9:11; esp. as marriageable, Ge 24:14, Ge 24:16, Ge 24:28, Ge 24:55, Ge 24:57, Ge 34:3, Ge 34:12 (all J), De 22:15, De 22:15, De 22:16, De 22:19, De 22:20, De 22:21, De 22:24, De 22:26, De 22:26, De 22:29, 1Ki 1:3, 1Ki 1:4, Es 2:4, Es 2:7, Es 2:8, Es 2:9, Es 2:12, Es 2:12, Es 2:13; specif. virgin [[בְּתוּלָה]] ´[[נ]] Ju Jdg 21:12, De 22:23, De 22:28, 1Ki 1:2, Es 2:2, Es 2:3 (cf. De 22:15 b, De 22:20); [[מְאׂרָשָׂה]] ´[[נ]] betrothed girl De 22:25, De 22:27, young widow Ru 2:6, Ru 4:12; of a concubine Ju Jdg 19:3, Jdg 19:4, Jdg 19:5, Jdg 19:6, Jdg 19:8, Jdg 19:9, a prostitute Am 2:7.

of female attendants, maids (alw. pl.), Ge 24:61 (J), Ex 2:5 (E), 1Sa 25:42, Pr 9:3, Pr 27:27, Pr 31:15, Es 2:9, Es 2:9, Es 4:4, Es 4:16; gleaners Ru 2:5, Ru 2:8, Ru 2:22, Ru 2:23, Ru 3:2.—Note. [[נער]] Kt in Pent. as fem. (Qr [[נַעֲרָ֠]]) is prob. not original; it is not found in Sam. Pent., and fpl. [[נַעֲרׂתֶיהָ]] occurs Gn Ex; cf. Ges:§§ 2 n, 17 c.
